name: Gigafyte
description:
Gigafyte is a FPS that takes place inside your PC.  Use ricochet physics to complete puzzles. Destroy the malware and maneuver your way to the source of the virus.

Created for FSU 3D Game Development Fall 2020

This game was created by:

Tori C - Programmer

Jess S - Level Designer

Chris G - Artist

Joe T - Artist
